ALAS-2017-860

Amazon Linux AMI Security Advisory: ALAS-2017-860
Advisory Release Date: 2017-07-25 17:54 Pacific
Advisory Updated Date: 2017-07-25 17:56 Pacific
Severity: Critical
References: CVE-2017-10053  CVE-2017-10067  CVE-2017-10074  CVE-2017-10090  CVE-2017-10096  CVE-2017-10101  CVE-2017-10102  CVE-2017-10107  CVE-2017-10108  CVE-2017-10109  CVE-2017-10110  CVE-2017-10111  CVE-2017-10115  CVE-2017-10116  CVE-2017-10135  CVE-2017-10193  CVE-2017-10198 
Issue Overview:


Affected Packages:

java-1.8.0-openjdk


Issue Correction:
Run yum update java-1.8.0-openjdk to update your system.

New Packages:
i686:
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-debuginfo-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.i686
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-src-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.i686
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-demo-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.i686
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-headless-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.i686
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.i686
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.i686

noarch:
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-javadoc-zip-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.noarch
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-javadoc-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.noarch

src:
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.src

x86_64:
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-debuginfo-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.x86_64
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.x86_64
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-headless-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.x86_64
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.x86_64
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-demo-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.x86_64
    java-1.8.0-openjdk-src-1.8.0.141-1.b16.32.amzn1.x86_64
